Job Description:
Key Responsibilities:
Data Engineering Responsibilities:
Design, develop, and maintain robust ETL pipelines to ingest, process, and store large-scale datasets from various data sources.
Optimize and maintain data storage solutions (e.g., relational databases, data lakes, and data warehouses) for efficient querying and analysis.
Ensure the reliability and integrity of data pipelines, monitoring and resolving data quality issues.
Collaborate with the DevOps team to integrate and scale data platforms in a cloud-based environment (e.g., AWS, Google Cloud).
Data Science & Analytics:
Develop and deploy machine learning models to solve business problems such as classification, regression, clustering, and forecasting.
Use Python and advanced SQL to manipulate and analyze large datasets, extracting actionable insights.
Apply statistical methods and algorithms to analyze complex datasets and communicate findings in clear, actionable terms.
Experiment with feature engineering and optimize ML models for performance and scalability.
Collaboration & Stakeholder Engagement:
Work closely with data engineers, data scientists, and business stakeholders to understand their data needs and create scalable solutions.
Translate business requirements into data products, predictive models, and analytical solutions that drive strategic decision-making.
Present analytical insights and ML model results to technical and non-technical audiences.
Data Pipeline Optimization:
Leverage expertise in ETL processes to automate data extraction, transformation, and loading from various sources.
Work on optimizing data pipelines for better performance, ensuring efficient data retrieval for machine learning models and reports.
Model Deployment & Monitoring:
Deploy machine learning models into production environments and monitor performance over time.
Set up monitoring systems to track model performance and retrain models as needed to ensure ongoing accuracy.
Qualifications:
Education: Bachelors or Master’s degree in Computer Science, Data Science, Engineering, or a related field.
Experience:
3+ years of experience in Data Engineering or Data Science roles.
Strong proficiency in Python and advanced SQL for data manipulation and analysis.
Experience with ETL tools and processes to build scalable data pipelines.
Hands-on experience with machine learning algorithms and model development.
Familiarity with cloud platforms such as AWS, Google Cloud, or Azure.
Technical Skills:
Programming Languages: Strong proficiency in Python for data analysis, model building, and automation.
SQL Expertise: Advanced SQL skills, including query optimization, complex joins, and handling large datasets.
ETL Pipelines: Experience with ETL tools (e.g., Apache Airflow, Talend, dbt) and data integration techniques.
Machine Learning: Experience in developing and deploying ML models (classification, regression, clustering, etc.) using libraries such as scikit-learn, TensorFlow, or PyTorch.
Familiarity with data warehousing solutions (e.g., Redshift, BigQuery, Snowflake).
Soft Skills:
Strong problem-solving abilities and attention to detail.
Excellent communication skills to present complex technical solutions to non-technical stakeholders.
Ability to work collaboratively in a cross-functional team and manage multiple projects simultaneously.
Proactive approach to staying updated with emerging technologies in both data engineering and data science fields.
Preferred Skills:
Experience with big data technologies such as Apache Spark, Hadoop, or Kafka.
Knowledge of data pipeline orchestration tools (e.g., Apache Airflow).
Experience with model deployment and MLOps tools (e.g., Docker, Kubernetes, MLflow).
Familiarity with deep learning techniques and tools (e.g., Keras, PyTorch).
Proficiency in data visualization tools such as Tableau, Power BI, or Looker.
Education: UG: Any Graduate
Key Skills: Advance Sql, Python, SQL Queries, Spark, ETL Tool, Machine Learning, Ml Algorithms, SQL

Job Description:
About the Role:
You would be part of asset analytics and data science team and work on cutting edge problems for the bank. The individual will work closely with the stakeholders across risk, business, partnerships, digital and strategy in creating and refining strategies to augment profitability and growth for the bank. The incumbent will majorly be responsible with coming up data driven and actionable insights and presenting them to relevant stakeholders The candidate will work in close collaboration with digital product, growth, and marketing teams.
Job Responsibilities:
Querying databases and using statistical computer languages: Python and SQL.
Use predictive modelling to increase and optimize customer experiences, revenue generation, ad targeting and other business outcomes.
Work with large and multiple datasets, data warehouses and pull data using relevant programs and coding.
Strong background in Statistical Analysis. Constantly look and research on ML algorithms and data sources for better prediction.
Work and coordinate with multiple stakeholders to identify opportunities for leveraging company data to drive business solutions, implement models and monitor outcomes.
Assess the effectiveness and accuracy of new data sources and data gathering techniques and develop processes and tools to monitor and analyze model performance and data accuracy.
Leverage analytics to increase customer lifetime value for clients acquired digitally by pitching right product to the right client at the right time.
Help define pricing models for digital value propositions for various segments of users / clients to ensure profitability of the portfolio and to ensure achievement of business outcomes.
Work with product, growth, and marketing teams across product/campaign lifecycle
Empower product and marketing teams by creating automated dashboards and reports using PowerBI.

Eligibility:
6-10 years of Data Science experience preferably in Banking/ Financial Services.
Well versed with necessary data reprocessing and feature engineering skills.
Experience in establishing/scaling up data science functions.
Proven ability to discover solutions hidden in large datasets and to drive business results with their data-based insights.
Model development experience in Python.
Strong and in-depth understanding of statistics.
Strong strategic thought leadership and problem-solving skills with ability to tackle unstructured and complex business problems.
Ability to build & use relationships and influence broadly across the organization.
Results driven with strong project management skills, ability to work on multiple priorities.
Statistics and Hypothesis Testing.
Excellent written and verbal communication.

About the Digital Business Unit at IndusInd:

The mandate of the Digital Business Unit at IndusInd Bank is as follows:
Building customer centric products with human centered design principles for retail Individual and micro, small and medium enterprise (MSME) customer segments.
Build innovative products and propositions backed with problem solving mindset to discover and solve latent needs of customers.
Build Embedded Finance (Banking as a Service) applications.
Ensure designs are highly available, highly modular, highly scalable and highly secure
Drive digital business.

Some of the applications managed by the Digital Business Unit include IndusMobile (banks mobile app for retail individual clients), Indusnet (net banking application of the bank), IndusMerchantSolutions app, Whatsapp Banking, Chatbots, easycredit for Individuals, easycredit for Business Owners, savings, current account and fixed deposit online platforms. There are many more innovative digital products and solutions in pipeline.

The units objectives are three fold:

(a) Drive better customer experience and engagement..
(b) transform existing lines of businesses and
(c) build new digital only or banking as a service led digital business models.
Education: UG: B.Tech/B.E. in Any Specialization
Key Skills: Data Science, Campaign Analytics, Statistical Data Analysis, Marketing Analytics, Model Development, Banking Analytics, Customer Analytics, Python, SQL

Job Description:
As a Data Scientist at IBM, you will help transform our clients' data into tangible business value by analyzing information, communicating outcomes and collaborating on product development. Work with Best in Class open source and visual tools, along with the most flexible and scalable deployment options. Whether it's investigating patient trends or weather patterns, you will work to solve real world problems for the industries transforming how we live.

Your Role and Responsibilities
IBM Cloud Economics are looking for a Data Scientist to join our team and help us leverage data to optimize the business outcomes at IBM Cloud. You will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining data pipelines, databases, and analytics solutions that support the planning, forecasting, and reporting of our third-party expenses, supply chain performance and identifying opportunities to improve the profitability of our Cloud services. You will also be responsible for monitoring and managing global inventories, as well as excess and obsolescence, and ensuring timely and cost-effective delivery of materials and products. You will also be responsible for teaching non-technical team members capabilities to self service automation and reporting.
To be successful as a Data Scientist, you should have a bachelor's degree, and more importantly, experience with data engineering tools, frameworks, and languages, such as SQL, Python, etc. You should also have experience with ERP systems (operational and financial), reporting tools, automation, and ETL processes. Experience with IBM Cognos and/or Apptio would be an advantage. You should also have strong analytical, financial accounting/business acumen, communication, and problem-solving skills, as well as the ability to work in a fast-paced and dynamic environment.

Responsibilities:
Provide feedback on design, develop, and maintenance of data pipelines, databases, and analytics solutions that support supply chain operations.
Collect, transform, and integrate data from various sources, such as ERP systems, external APIs, and web scraping
Ensure data quality, reliability, and security throughout the data lifecycle
Build and deploy data models and tools to simulate and optimize supply chain scenarios, as well as help deploy financial models
Create and present automated reports and dashboards on supply chain performance, metrics, and KPIs
Identify and implement opportunities for improving data efficiency, scalability, and usability
Monitor and manage inventory levels and availability across our supply chain network, as well as, monitor and mitigate excess and obsolescence
Provide feedback on the ability to forecast sales and production levels based on historical data, market trends, and customer demand
Identify and implement opportunities for improving efficiency, reducing costs, and increasing customer satisfaction


Required Technical and Professional Expertise
Bachelor's degree in finance, accounting, computer science, engineering, data science, or a related field
5+ years of experience in data engineering, data analysis, planning, logistics, accounting, finance or a similar role
Proficient in data scientist tools, frameworks, and languages, such as SQL and Python
Proficient in ERP systems (operational and financial), reporting tools, automation, and ETL processes
Proficiency in IBM Cognos and/Apptio would be an advantage
Excellent analytical, communication, and problem-solving skills
Ability to work independently and collaboratively


Preferred Technical and Professional Expertise
None
Education:
UG: Any Graduate
PG: Any Postgraduate
Key Skills: python, business acumen, sql, financial accounting, etl, erp, data analysis, forecasting, dbms, cognos, data engineering, dashboards, data quality, open source, tableau, data science, ibm cognos, product development, reporting tools

As a Data Scientist at IBM, you will help transform our clients' data into tangible business value by analyzing information, communicating outcomes and collaborating on product development. Work with Best in Class open source and visual tools, along with the most flexible and scalable deployment options. Whether it's investigating patient trends or weather patterns, you will work to solve real world problems for the industries transforming how we live.

Your Role and Responsibilities
The IBM Sustainability Software business unit is seeking a talented and motivated data scientist to work as a Data Scientist across our portfolio of software products. Our group helps companies turn their sustainability ambitions into actions by embedding AI into the software that they use for managing their supply chains, assets, complex engineering, and environmental intelligence processes. We work on problems for everything from predicting asset failures from IOT data to optimizing supply chain decisions to helping companies reduce their carbon footprint and understand the impacts of climate change on their business. You will work across the entire AI and software lifecycles including requirements gathering, use case definition, design, model building, implementation, testing, documentation, and delivery. You'll frequently work with Product Owners, Architects, Designers, Sales, Support, Business Partners, and customers throughout this process. This is an exciting opportunity to work as a part of a worldwide team of data scientists on problems that really matter at a scale that few other companies can support.

Job Description:
As a Data Scientist at IBM, you will help transform our clients' data into tangible business value by analyzing information, communicating outcomes and collaborating on product development. Work with Best in Class open source and visual tools, along with the most flexible and scalable deployment options. Whether it's investigating patient trends or weather patterns, you will work to solve real world problems for the industries transforming how we live.

Your Role and Responsibilities
Data powers the insights companies use to transform the way they work. Do you enjoy analyzing data to push marketers to take actions that improve their performance? Do you have proven experience finding actionable insights in large data sets that lead to measurable business results?
The Performance Analytics team directly impacts the direction of the marketing organization and all of IBM. We provide insights that drive both strategic and tactical outcomes for the company and directly guide marketing execution.
As a Data Scientist, you will work with business stakeholders, engineers, marketing and sales teams to use analytical insights to develop strategies for end-to-end campaign implementation and execution.
You will get exposure to all aspects of marketing, from early-stage audience targeting via paid media investment, to capturing demand through our web presence, to response to lead management and sales analytics.
In this role, you will have the opportunity to focus on synthesizing and applying analytic insights during the execution phase to improve performance for a particular business area, project or trial.
Perform complex quantitative analyses to evaluate customer engagement and the impact of marketing activities on-demand generation, including pipeline, revenue, content engagement, media spend optimization, routing, channel performance, lead conversion, pipeline yield and ROI, and other key strategic levers
Utilize proprietary and external data to analyze IBM's target audience segmentation and create recommendations for improving the user experience at all stages of the journey and identifying the right audience for targeting
Measure performance and establish new measurement systems to detect performance shifts and increase marketing effectiveness
Develop and lead execution of analytics projects for business use cases aligned to business strategies
Design and present data-driven optimization recommendations via dashboards, reports, and analyses
Communicate insights to team members, other marketing groups, and IBM leadership
We maintain a responsible consideration of health and safety practices and ongoing support for a hybrid office, in-office/remote office balance."
Required Technical and Professional Expertise
7+ years relevant analytics work experience in marketing analytics, including experience in a data-driven technology business or company with a sophisticated data stack
Technically skilled to perform complex data querying and work with complex data models using Advanced SQL/Python or other query and programming tools to process and analyze data
Demonstrates a strong ability to analyze and manipulate marketing data and work on complex data flows across systems
Thought leadership in working on functional objectives and shaping an analytical solution
Ability to perform root-cause analysis with limited supervision
Deep critical thinking skills and curiosity to pursue open-ended problems via data
Strong presentation skills and ability to effectively communicate complicated analyses to non-technical employees and leadership
Business acumen with the ability to develop data-driven business recommendations
Demonstrated ability to multitask with minimum supervision and prioritize with a proven ability to meet tight deadlines
Preferred Technical and Professional Expertise
Master's degree in Mathematics Statistics Economics Applied Statistics Applied Mathematics Computer Programming Analytics Data Science is a strong plus.
Relevant work experience in customer analytics, digital marketing analytics and web analytics is a plus.
Hands-on experience in build, deploy and automation of complex data flows involving sequential loops, multiple merge, data imputation, normalizing data is a strong plus
Education:
UG: Any Graduate
PG: Any Postgraduate
Key Skills: advance sql, customer analytics, presentation skills, web analytics, marketing analytics, digital marketing, applied mathematics, python, mathematics, dashboards, sql, open source, data science, product development, segmentation, data flow, statistics

Job Title: Principal Data Scientist/Senior Data Scientist - NLP/Machine Learning
Job Description:
Principal Data Scientist/Senior Data Scientist/Data Scientist - NLP/Machine Learning

Principal Data Scientist / Sr Data Scientists /Data Scientist / Jr. Data Scientist / Data Science Intern / Machine Learning Engineer-Global Tech AI Health Startup.

Joining : Immediately.

Job Location : Delhi NCR, India.

Global HQ, Benovymed Global Technology Development and Innovation Center & Benovymed Global R and D, and AI Health Innovation Center in Delhi NCR.

Job Role Responsibility Description :

We are looking for passionate, Strong experience with an entrepreneur mindset to join us as Hardcore Full Stack Data Scientist end-to-end single-handed multi-hat role who is already working in applied AI in ML, deep Learning, ANN, and CNN platform specifically working as single-handed doers or in a small Data Science Team with full end to end ownership of Data Science work commitment delivery as Data Scientist working in any reputed AI Data Science is driven Tech startup preferably in Healthcare.

Required Skillsets :

- Needs to have statistical, mathematical, and predictive modeling as well as business strategy skills to build the algorithms necessary to ask the right questions and find the right answers.

- Need to be able to communicate their findings, orally and visually.

- Need to understand how the products are developed and even more important, as big data touches the privacy of consumers, they need to have a set of ethical responsibilities.-

- Need to have a natural desire to go beneath the surface of a problem.

- Confident and self-secure as they more often than not will have to deal with situations where there is a lot of unknown.

- Good knowledge & experience in Artificial Neural Network ( ANN ), AI conversational Chatbot & Needs to be able to write the required Algorithm and coding programming.

- Preferably in different programming languages such as Python, Tensor Flow, Keras, AWS (ML and DL), Numpy, and Pytorch.

In addition the need to be familiar with disciplines as follows :

- Natural Language Processing, Machine learning, Conceptual modeling, Statistical analysis, Predictive Modeling, and Hypothesis testing.

Data scientists should have at least some of the following capabilities :

- Cleaning data, formatting data, Having the ability to query databases & perform statistical analysis, building AI Data Modelling, validating the AI Model, and deployment.

- Being able to develop or program databases.

- Having a good understanding of design & architecture principles.

Qualification :

B.Tech / M.Tech in CSE / Electrical / Electronics & Communication/ Maths & Computing /Statistics /BioTech/BioStat / Clinical Engineering in Data Science / Machine Learning from Top-rated Tech University / Top rated IIT /IIIT.

Mandatory Requirement :

Experience :

- Post last qualification of at least 0 to 7 Years of strong experience exclusive in real Industry Projects in applied AI ML & Deep Learning Data Science in an early-stage AI Health startup at the role and designation as a single-handed full-stack Principal Data Scientist / Sr. Data Scientist.

- Hardcore in ANN /Deep Learning /Machine Learning/NLP with at least 2-20 good Applied AI-oriented Applied Research Projects & applications with hardcore experience working on ANN, CNN, RNN, and deep learning in Digital Health startups to solve specific complex problems.
Education:
UG: B.Tech/B.E. in Any Specialization
PG: M.Tech in Any Specialization
Doctorate: Doctorate Not Required
Key Skills: Machine Learning, ANN, deep learning, AI Modelling, CNN, NLP, RNN, Natural Language Processing, AI Data Modelling

Job Description:
Senior Data Scientist

WHAT YOU WILL DO:
Business understanding, Data understanding/preparation, Modeling, Evaluation and Deployment of solutions.
Write high-quality production code as you build and maintain robust, scalable machine learning systems.
Develop, validate and deploy ML models, optimization solutions, inference techniques to solve complex problems and communicate ideas to stakeholders.
Clearly express the reasoning and logic when writing code in Jupyter notebooks, or other suitable mediums.
You will develop predictive models on large-scale datasets to address various business problems leveraging advanced statistical modelling, machine learning, or data mining techniques.
Design and implement infrastructure for orchestrating end-to-end machine learning lifecycles
Explore and evaluate novel algorithms for assessment and forecasting signals.
Continuously improving and refining models and algorithms to ensure their relevance and accuracy in changing market conditions.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to integrate AI model improvements based on insights from production data.

WHAT YOU WILL NEED:
4+ years of professional experience as a Data Scientist.
Strong Python coding skills including using ML frameworks like TensorFlow & Pytorch and strong working knowledge of MySQL.
Experience working in cloud technologies GCP, GCS, Big Querry, Vertex AI Workbench and Pipelines and Vector Search.
Experience working in large scale text data for semantic similarity and various NLP-based solutions is highly appreciated
Experience in using Github/Bitbucket for code version controls and collaboration
Should have worked on AI-based projects end-to-end.
Worked on creating Model end to end pipelines [processing - training - benchmarking - deployment]
Should have worked on unstructured data algorithms like clustering, dimensionality reduction etc.
Good hold of fundamentals in Deep Learning and Machine Learning.
Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills.
Excellent communication abilities to work with stakeholders and researchers successfully.

GOOD TO HAVE:
Model GPU training and GPU optimisations through Tensor-rt, onxx etc.
Workflow orchestration/Experiment tracking platforms like Prefect,MLlflow , kubeflow pipelines etc.
Computer Vision algorithms like object detection, Image Classification, Image segmentation etc.
LLM is good to have.
Knowledge of Docker files is good to have
Education: UG: Any Graduate
Key Skills: Natural Language Processing, Ml Algorithms, Ml Pipelines, Python, Tensorflow, Pytorch, LLM, Machine Learning, Deep Learning, ML Framework

Job Description:
Essential Qualification & Experience:
1. Minimum ~8-15 years of experience,

2. Data Exploration and Analysis:
a. Explore and analyse large datasets using Spark for distributed data processing.
b. Expertise in building a data framework and designing data pipeline for real-time analytics.
c. Expertise in Framework development for Demand, Planning, forecasting and recommendation.
d. Expertise in complex SQL queries design, development, and tuning.

3. Data & Data Pipeline:
a. Require Spark, Python, Airflow Design and build data pipelines using above
b. Real time data ingestion, transformation, and processing.
c. Expertise in data quality and data cataloguing, data management for high scaling analytics engine.
d. Must have experience in handling petabyte of the data, creating real time Analytics tool.
e. Experience in handling data strategy for structured and unstructured data.

4. Machine Learning and Modeling:
a. Develop and implement machine learning models for predictive analytics.
b. Apply statistical techniques to extract insights from data.
c. Exposure to ML & LLM algorithms.

5. Feature Engineering:
a. Create relevant features from raw data to improve model performance.
b. Collaborate with domain experts to identify meaningful features.
c. Data deduplication, data quality, data standardisation and sanitisation.
d. Required Hands-on Experience in Monitor model performance and make necessary adjustments.

6. Collaboration and Communication:
a. Work closely with cross-functional teams, including data engineers, product managers, and business stakeholders.
b. Communicate findings and insights effectively to both technical and non-technical audiences.

Preferred Qualification & Experience:
1. Bachelors degree or higher in Computer Science, Data Science, or a related field.
2. Strong experience with Spark for distributed data processing.
3. Proficiency in writing complex SQL queries.
4. Familiarity with real-time data stream platforms such as Kafka.
5. Solid understanding of statistical modelling and machine learning techniques.
6. Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills.
7. Effective communication and interpersonal skills.
8. Ability to Build a Real time dashboard for petabyte of data.

Preferred Soft Skills:
1. Bringing in Change
2. Hands on experience in building omni channel UI and apps which are cloud agnostic but can run on Amazon Web Services (AWS) / Azure cloud, dynamic UI, ability to design UX preferably in e-Commerce domain and platforms,
3. Experience with the Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC).
4. Experience with web services (consuming or creating) with REST or SOAP.
5. "Self-starter" attitude and ability to make decisions independently.

Preferred Functional & Technical Skills:
1. Creating experience which is suitable for web and mobile

Position Summary:
This position will work with the Data Architect / Scientist for developing new capabilities, services and SaaS platform for sales and services journey of customer and sellers across the lifecycle of Ecommerce engagement.
This position will closely engage with the platform leadership team and the business functions to understand the platform vision, clients pain areas, and industry landscape, and ensure the strategic evolution of back-end services, code-base, and product design to realize the same. This position will be closely engaged in developing technology plans, sprint planning, development lifecycle

Responsibilities (not the inclusive list)
1. In consultation with the architect, you will be working on technical design, coding, testing, tuning, and stabilizing.
2. This role requires 40 % coding, 40 % design and 10% collaboration with team members
3. You will work in agile engineering team, which is ahead of the curve & engaged in creating one of the most successful next generation e-commerce platform services
4. You will be responsible to work in agile time following platform defined engineering processes to build highly flexible and scalable services
5. You will ensure finetuning of services to scale for multi hundred tenants base and 100K+ customers
6. You will integrate with UI to provide high degree of user engagement and workflows
7. You will be responsible for unit testing, unit performance testing, module, and system integration to build predictable and highly available services
8. You will partner with functional and product management teams to deliver business needs and participate in platform development processes to ensure bug free code
9. You will be responsible for bug fixes, integration and deployment following CI/CD guidelines
10. Improve the CI/CD pipelines to meet platform development milestones and goals
Education:

Job Description:
Your mission, roles and responsibilities
The main missions of the role are:
Perform engineering assignments as part of design / project team for various projects assigned, following, and applying the systems and standards set by Faurecia and OEMs under the guidance of / Product Design Engineer.
Uses appropriate software, to develop 3D models and drawings that meet engineering specifications.
Follow the work instructions and work descriptions given by the product design engineer. 
Follow the set OEM standards and CAD methodology.
Follow the systems and procedures of Faurecia - Only CAD / Design related
Complete the assignment within the estimated time or before the decided delivery date as given by PDE.
Ensure regular daily timesheet punching in SAP.
To ensure the availability of information mentioned in the work order e.g., CAD data and relevant documents.
Understand the work description and contact the product design engineer in case of any query.
To fill up the checklist before delivery of the project & get it approved from /Product Design Engineer.
To do self-inspection and take ownership of the work done for all task related to complete seat investigations/Studies /Documentations/DMU management/ comparison & Kanban closure with Checklist
To highlight issues to / Product Design Engineer and propose improvement ideas for continuous improvement on processes and systems.
To ensure that all the specifications, Guidelines to follow and standard interfaces or templates. 
Ensure maximum usage of templates and macros.
To adhere and respect shift schedule and timings.
To plan leaves in advance with intimation to Design and Development Team Leader and Product Design Engineer.
Respond to all training invitations and ensure 100% training attendance for all accepted trainings.
To ensure flexibility and multi-tasking to work in different work groups and projects.
To uphold & abide by code of ethics & Management.
Awareness of QMS policy & Processes.
Ensuring all work process & procedures are in align with QMS objectives & reporting any incident of deviation from QMS.
Your profile and competencies to succeed
Minimum education level
Bachelor’s degree / Diploma in mechanical/ automobile/ production/ polymer engineering
Professional Experience
Bachelor’s Degree / Diploma in mechanical/ automobile/ production/ polymer engineering with prior experience of minimum 1 - 2 years in CAD Software (CATIA / IDEAS / UG etc.) and plastics.
OR GET with minimum 6 - 12 months Faurecia domain experience.
Skills and competencies
Good communication skills in English.   
Knowledge in relevant engineering domain (Seatings-Complete  seat ,interiors, exteriors, acoustics etc) and automobile terminology.
Good understanding of plastic part design & tooling Knowledge as per GET training syllabus.
Good knowledge of CAD Methodology and best practices as per GET Training syllabus
What we can do for you
At Forvia, you will find an engaging and dynamic environment where you can contribute to the development of sustainable mobility leading technologies.  
We are the seventh-largest global automotive supplier, employing more than 157,000 people in more than 40 countries which makes a lot of opportunity for career development. 
We welcome energetic and agile people who can thrive in a fast-changing environment. People who share our strong values. Team players with a collaborative mindset and a passion to deliver high standards for our clients. Lifelong learners. High performers. Globally minded people who aspire to work in a transforming industry, where excellence, speed, and quality count. 
We cultivate a learning environment, dedicating tools and resources to ensure we remain at the forefront of mobility.  Our people enjoy an average of more than 22 hours of online and in-person training within FORVIA University (five campuses around the world) 
We offer a multicultural environment that values diversity and international collaboration. We believe that diversity is a strength. To create an inclusive culture where all forms of diversity create real value for the company, we have adopted gender diversity targets and inclusion action plans. 
Achieving CO2 Net Zero as a pioneer of the automotive industry is a priority: In June 2022, Forvia became the first global automotive group to be certified with the new SBTI Net-Zero Standard (the most ambitious standard of SBTi), aligned with the ambition of the 2015 Paris Agreement of limiting global warming to 1.5C. Three principles guide our action:use less, use betteranduse longer, with a focus on recyclability and circular economy.
Education: UG: B.Tech/B.E. in Electronics/Telecommunication, Instrumentation, Computers, Electrical
Key Skills: generative AI, AWS, Deep Learning, Python, azure, Machine Learning, Devops

Job Description:
We're looking for a Data Scientist II to join our outstanding team. You'll work closely with a team of engineers to create a platform on top of that data that will be leveraged by virtually every other product and system we have built or will build in the future. You'll be responsible for experimenting to create new models to improve Bazaarvoice products and retraining existing models.
Primary Duties of the Role:
Apply (and extend) state-of-the-art natural language processing, machine learning, and statistical techniques to develop predictive models and optimization algorithms.
Use sophisticated analytical methods to automate existing processes and enable new capabilities
Utilize machine learning and large-scale data mining techniques to discover and identify actionable patterns in the data.
Build prototypes to test new algorithms
Deep dive into the data to understand and apply patterns, while maintaining a sense of the big picture
Work closely with engineers & product managers to put research results into action
Skills and Experience Necessary for the Role:
Hands-on experience with machine learning techniques, such as logistic regression, nave bayes, SVM, decision trees, neural networks, and random forests
Structured thinker, effective communicator, and excellent Data Analysis skills
Practical experience applying statistical analysis (in A|B testing, causal inference, ML, etc.)
Statistical software packages (R, S-Plus, Matlab, SAS, or similar)
Requirements:
Bachelor's Degree in Statistics, Computer Science, Mathematics, or equivalent work experience
2+ Years of Experience in Data Science
3+ Years experience analyzing data using SQL
2+ Years experience with Python/Scala
2+ Years Experience developing products on Public cloud Hosting platforms (ex. AWS, GCP, etc)
Education:
UG: B.Tech/B.E. in Any Specialization
PG: Any Postgraduate
Key Skills: Data Science, matlab, python, scala, GCP, data mining, neural networks, machine learning, logistic regression, AWS, sql

Job Description:
The Digital Transformation Organization at Forvia is a key player in our ongoing strategic transformation into a Digital Enterprise” and plays a major role in guaranteeing the service and support that ensures our business succeeds in our fast-moving world.
Digital Transformation Organization is a fast-growing team in charge of providing advanced data solutions for manufacturing excellence and efficiency as well as for smart product development for the automotive industry.
The essential responsibilities and duties
In order to meet rising expectations, we are looking to enrich our team by recruiting a Data Scientist. You will be getting involved in projects ranging from automated quality inspection and manufacturing process optimization to intelligent systems development integrated in our products. For this position, it is necessary a solid track record on applied machine learning including deep learning and reinforcement learning. Also, programming skills are important as we need to deliver production ready software, so proficiency in at least one programming language is expected.
Qualifications and skills
Level 1-Previous working experience as a Data Scientist minimum 5 years
Level 2-Previous working experience as a Data Scientist for 3 to 5 years
In-depth knowledge of Agile process and principles
Outstanding communication, presentation, and leadership skills
Excellent organizational and time management skills
Sharp analytical and problem-solving skills
Creative thinker with a vision
Flexibility / capacity of adaptation
Presentation skills (project reviews with customers and top management)
Interest in industrial & automotive topics
Fluent in English
Ability to work in international teams
Engineering degree with strong background in mathematics and computer science. A PhD in a quantitative field and/or a minimum of 3 years of experience in machine learning is a plus.
Excellent understanding of traditional machine learning techniques and algorithms, such as k-NN, SVM, Random Forests, etc.
Understanding of deep learning techniques
Understanding and, ideally, experience with Reinforcement Learning methods
Experience using ML, DL frameworks (Scikit-learn, XGBoost, TensorFlow, Keras, MXNet, etc.)
Proficiency in at least one programming language (preferably python)
Experience with SQL and NoSQL databases
Excellent verbal and written skills in English is mandatory Engineering degree A PhD in a quantitative field and/or a minimum of 3 years of experience in machine learning is a plus.
Appreciated extra skills
Experience in signal and image processing
Experience in forecasting and time series modeling
Experience with computer vision libraries like OpenCV
Experience using cloud platforms
Experience with versioning control systems (git)
Interest in IoT and hardware adapted to ML tasks

Job Description:
PayPal s Risk as a Service Data Scientists are comprehensive analytical experts who collaborate with a team of technical and business industry experts, to ensure that their customers are successful in their deployments in catching fraud and malicious activities. They continually improve and apply their technical knowledge and analytical skills across the product suite at every level of the customer.

Meet Our Team

Our team is highly motivated, enthusiastic, and client-focused. we'do whatever is necessary to empower PayPal s merchants to fight fraud in their businesses. If you are a fast learner, and willing to solve problems in the fraud space at scale, we would love to talk with you.
  Your way to impact.
As a successful Data Scientist, you will build upon the products and provide subject matter expertise to ensure that they can not only design, implement, and deploy a successful fraud solution, including machine learning models and data analysis, as we'll as be able to explain and design the solution together with the clients business team, leading to happy customers.
  Your day to day
Work closely with multiple large & strategic customers to consult and strategize on the approach in tackling fraud, and ensure Fraud Protection is deployed and performs we'll
Regularly analyze large data sets to identify fraud patterns and implement necessary changes to the system
Work on top of a state-of-the-art technology stack and together with a dedicated data science and engineering team to design and implement data driven solutions that operate at scale and in real-time
Be a clear subject matter expert of Fraud protection platform as we'll as developing risk solutions in specific fields (banking, finance, eCommerce)
Make business recommendations to the executive and cross-functional teams with effective presentations of findings at multiple levels of stakeholders
Collate feedback from clients and work with cross functional teams to recommend, design and implement new product features
Work with engineering teams to ensure best practices are followe'd for product deployment and solution implementation
What do you need to bring-
bachelors Degree in Computer Science, Engineering, Mathematics, Statistics, Data Mining or related field or equivalent practical experience
A minimum of 4 years of experience in advanced Data Analysis, Research, Risk and Fraud Investigation or Internet Industry
Experience with Python, SQL
Sound understanding of ML concepts like regression, classification etc
Preferred Experience:
MS/PhD Degree in Computer Science, Engineering, Mathematics, Statistics, Data Mining or related field or equivalent practical experience
Experience in one of the following areas: eCommerce, online payments, user trust/risk/fraud investigation/product abuse
Project Management experience and attention to detail with the ability to gets things done.
Strong process improvement, prioritization, and multi-tasking capabilities
Demonstrated analytical thinking through data-driven decisions, as we'll as the technical know-how, and ability to work with your team to make a big impact
Knowledge of database structures and/or working with Unix/Linux
Outstanding leadership, influencing, communication, interpersonal and teamwork skills
Education:
UG: Any Graduate
PG: Any Postgraduate
Key Skills: Unix, Data analysis, Linux, Project management, Process improvement, Data mining, Financial services, SQL

About the Company: InsuranceDekho

Launched in the year 2016, InsuranceDekho is Indias leading Insurtech. In the past 8 years, the company has seen exponential growth of approximately 2x every year. Headquartered in Gurugram, we have a presence in over 98% pin codes of India.

Our vision is to transform the insurance buying experience by building deep distribution, enabling digitization, and leading diversi- fication into new product lines. We are a high-energy startup that believes in a people-first culture.

We are backed by Goldman Sachs Asset Management, TVS Capital Funds, Mitsubishi UFJ Financial Group, BNP Paribas Cardif, and Ratan Tata and have raised ~$200 mn within this year. Awarded the "Best in Class Insurtech Startup" by Global Fintech Awards 2022), the company aims to become a partner of choice for consumers, and insurance companies as well as partner intermediaries in the auto, health, general, life, pet, and travel insurance domains.

Job Description:
Data Scientist: Required Skills, Roles, and Responsibilities
1. Required Skills:

Technical Skills:

Programming Languages: Advanced proficiency in Python and R for developing algorithms, models, and data analysis.
Machine Learning: Deep understanding of machine learning algorithms, including supervised, unsupervised, and reinforcement learning.
Statistical Analysis: Expertise in statistical techniques, hypothesis testing, and data modeling to derive insights and build models.
Data Manipulation: Proficiency in using libraries like Pandas, NumPy, and tools like SQL for data wrangling and transformation.
Data Visualization: Experience with visualization tools like Matplotlib, Seaborn, Plotly, or Tableau to communicate insights.
Big Data Technologies: Familiarity with big data tools and platforms like Hadoop, Spark, and cloud services (AWS, Azure, Google Cloud).
Deep Learning (Optional): Knowledge of deep learning frameworks like TensorFlow, Keras, or PyTorch for complex model development.
Data Engineering: Understanding of data pipelines, ETL processes, and working with large-scale data storage solutions.
Soft Skills:

Problem-Solving: Strong ability to identify business problems and develop data-driven solutions.
Critical Thinking: Capability to question assumptions, identify biases, and think critically about the data.
Communication: Effectiveness in conveying complex technical information to non-technical stakeholders.
Business Acumen: Understanding of the business context and industry to align data science efforts with organizational goals.
Collaboration: Ability to work cross-functionally with other teams (e.g., product, engineering, marketing).
2. Roles and Responsibilities:

Data Acquisition and Preparation:

Data Collection: Gather structured and unstructured data from multiple sources, including databases, APIs, and external datasets.
Data Cleaning: Pre-process data to handle missing values, outliers, and ensure data quality.
Feature Engineering: Develop and select features that will improve the performance of machine learning models.
Model Development:

Algorithm Selection: Choose appropriate machine learning or statistical algorithms based on the problem.
Model Building: Design, train, and validate machine learning models to solve complex business problems.
Hyperparameter Tuning: Optimize model performance through techniques like cross-validation and hyperparameter tuning.
Model Evaluation: Assess model accuracy using metrics like precision, recall, F1-score, and ROC-AUC.
Deployment and Monitoring:

Model Deployment: Implement models into production environments, ensuring they are scalable and efficient.
A/B Testing: Design and run experiments to validate the effectiveness of models in real-world scenarios.
Performance Monitoring: Continuously monitor model performance and retrain as necessary to maintain accuracy.
Business Integration:

Stakeholder Communication: Present findings and model results to stakeholders, translating technical insights into business strategies.
Solution Development: Collaborate with product managers, engineers, and other teams to integrate data science solutions into business operations.
Innovation: Identify new opportunities for leveraging data science within the organization to drive innovation and competitive advantage.
Research and Development:

Stay Current: Keep up-to-date with the latest advancements in data science, machine learning, and AI.
Experimentation: Conduct research and experiments to explore new algorithms, tools, and methodologies.
Tool Development: Create custom tools and processes to streamline data science workflows within the organization.
Education: UG: Any Graduate
Key Skills: and data analysis., Machine Learning, Data Science, Deep Learning

Role Description :

This is a full-time on-site role located in Chennai for a Lead Data Scientist at BigTapp Analytics.

The role involves leveraging advanced big data analytics, predictive modeling, and machine learning to optimize offerings, enhance risk management, detect fraud, streamline compliance, and make data-driven decisions.

Qualifications :

- 5-8+ years of experience in data sciences and should have handled a team of data engineers, analysts, and scientists.

- Proven experience in developing actionable insights and recommendations for business leaders.

- Excellent critical thinking skills, combined with the ability to present your beliefs clearly and compellingly verbally and in written form.

- Experience deploying data science solutions with proven business benefits.

- Educational background in statistics/data sciences/engineering.

- PhD in related field will be an added advantage.

- Proficiency with open-source analytical tools and one or more Data Science Platforms (AWS Sage maker/ Azure ML/ H2O AI/ Databricks etc.

- Proficient in database programming in SQL.

- Proficient in software development technologies, especially Python.

- Domain expertise in any one or more of the following domains: Finance, Insurance, Manufacturing, Retail & FMCG.

- Experience and familiarity with common business use cases of analytics.

Key Role Responsibilities :

- Lead the development, validation, and delivery of algorithms, statistical models, and business analysis.

- Mentor and coach, our team of data analysts and data scientists to achieve business goals and deliver high-quality solutions to our clients.

- Develop algorithms and statistical predictive models and determine analytical approaches and modelling techniques to evaluate scenarios and potential future outcomes.

- Lead the team in adopting scalable, efficient, and automated processes for large-scale data analysis and ML Ops.

- Provide thought-leadership and dependable execution on diverse projects.

- Identify emergent trends and opportunities for future client growth and development.

- Collaborate with cross-functional teams to develop solutions that meet client needs.

- Present results and recommendations to non-technical business audiences to drive the decision-making process.

Nice-to-Have :

- Experience with data engineering and big data tools (e.g, Google Big Query, Hadoop/AWS EMR, Kafka).

- Programming in NOSQL environments.

Job Description:
Job Details:
We are seeking a motivated and adaptable engineer with a minimum of 4 years of experience in software development, data engineering, or cloud technologies with a strong background in Python to join our team as a Google Cloud Platform (GCP) Data Science and AI Engineer. The ideal candidate will have a foundational understanding of cloud services and programming, with a strong desire to learn and specialize in GCP AI/ML technologies. Candidates primary responsibility will be to design, develop, and deploy innovative AI / GenAI solutions using GCP's powerful suite of tools. By joining our team, the candidate will have the chance to contribute to cutting-edge AI projects and leverage the power of GCP to drive innovation.
Key Responsibilities:
1. GCP Data Science & AI Implementation:
Design, develop, and deploy data science and AI models using GCP services like Vertex AI, BigQuery ML, Cloud TPU etc.
Utilize GCP's MLOps capabilities for efficient model development, deployment, and management.
Explore and apply advanced AI techniques such as generative AI, reinforcement learning, and federated learning.

2. Machine Learning:
Design solutions utilizing different types of Machine Learning techniques such as Supervised, Unsupervised, Classification, Regression.
Build pipeline for AI / ML model development process
Evaluation of Machine Learning Models and how to address Overfitting / Underfitting.

3. Data Engineering:
Ingest, clean, and prepare data for analysis using GCP data processing tools.
Develop data pipelines and workflows to automate data extraction, transformation, and loading (ETL) using tools such as Apache Beam, Cloud Composer etc.
Implement and maintain data pipelines using GCP services such as BigQuery, Dataflow, Dataproc, Pub/Sub, Cloud Run etc.

4. Model Development & Evaluation:
Develop and train machine learning models using TensorFlow, PyTorch, or other frameworks.
Evaluate model performance using appropriate metrics and techniques.
Optimize models for production deployment, considering factors like latency, scalability, and cost.

5. AI Applications:
Build and deploy AI applications across various domains, such as natural language processing, computer vision, and predictive analytics.
Integrate AI models with GCP services to create end-to-end solutions.

6. Security, Networking & Compliance (Good to have skills):
Implement and maintain data security best practices within the GCP environment.
Understand and manage networking concepts such as VPC, Cloud Load Balancing, and IAM within GCP.
Ensure compliance with industry standards and internal data governance policies.

7. Collaboration & Support:
Collaborate with data analysts, data engineers, and other stakeholders to understand business requirements and translate them into data science solutions.
Provide technical guidance and support to team members.

8. Continuous Improvement:
Stay updated on the latest advancements in data science, AI, and GCP technologies.
Contribute to the development of best practices and standards within the team.

Skills:
Strong understanding and extensive experience in Python programming languages
Exposure to basic data analysis or machine learning concepts.
Familiarity and experience with cloud computing platforms. (GCP preferred)
Basic knowledge of version control systems (e.g., Git).
Ability to quickly learn multiple technologies and adapt to new tools and platforms.
Strong interest in technology and a passion for staying up to date with industry trends.
Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
Effective communication and collaboration skills.
Education:
Bachelors degree in computer science, information technology, data science, statistics, or a related field.

Preferred Certifications:
Relevant Programming Language certification (e.g., Certified Python Developer etc.)
Any other Software Development or Software Engineering related certification
Any cloud engineering certification (GCP preferred)
Education: UG: B.Tech/B.E. in Any Specialization
Key Skills: Data Science, Generative AI, GCP, Machine Learning, Python, Aiml, Gcp Cloud

Job Description:
As a successful Data Scientist, you will build upon the products and provide subject matter expertise to ensure that they can not only design, implement, and deploy a successful fraud solution, including machine learning models and data analysis, as well as be able to explain and design the solution together with the clients business team, leading to happy customers.
Your day to day
Work closely with multiple large & strategic customers to consult and strategize on the approach in tackling fraud, and ensure Fraud Protection is deployed and performs well
Regularly analyze large data sets to identify fraud patterns and implement necessary changes to the system
Work on top of a state-of-the-art technology stack and together with a dedicated data science and engineering team to design and implement data driven solutions that operate at scale and in real-time
Be a clear subject matter expert of Fraud protection platform as well as developing risk solutions in specific fields (banking, finance, eCommerce)
Make business recommendations to the executive and cross-functional teams with effective presentations of findings at multiple levels of stakeholders
Collate feedback from clients and work with cross functional teams to recommend, design and implement new product features
Work with engineering teams to ensure best practices are followed for product deployment and solution implementation
What do you need to bring-
Bachelor s Degree in Computer Science, Engineering, Mathematics, Statistics, Data Mining or related field or equivalent practical experience
A minimum of 4 years of experience in advanced Data Analysis, Research, Risk and Fraud Investigation or Internet Industry
Experience with Python, SQL
Sound understanding of ML concepts like regression, classification etc.
Preferred Experience:
MS/PhD Degree in Computer Science, Engineering, Mathematics, Statistics, Data Mining or related field or equivalent practical experience
Experience in one of the following areas: eCommerce, online payments, user trust/risk/fraud investigation/product abuse
Project Management experience and attention to detail with the ability to gets things done.
Strong process improvement, prioritization, and multi-tasking capabilities
Demonstrated analytical thinking through data-driven decisions, as well as the technical know-how, and ability to work with your team to make a big impact
Knowledge of database structures and/or working with Unix/Linux
Outstanding leadership, influencing, communication, interpersonal and teamwork skills

UG: Any Graduate
PG: Any Postgraduate

Job Description:
About the Role:
We are seeking a skilled Data Scientist to join our team, focusing on developing and deploying AI/ML models in production environments. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in data science, coupled with hands-on experience in real-world AI deployments. This role offers an exciting opportunity to work on cutting-edge technologies and drive innovation in data-driven decision-making.
Key Responsibilities:
Develop, train, and deploy machine learning models to address complex business problems.
Analyze large datasets to extract actionable insights, patterns, and trends.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to integrate AI solutions into production systems.
Optimize and maintain models in production to ensure they perform at scale.
Design and implement data pipelines, ensuring data quality and integrity.
Conduct A/B testing, model validation, and performance monitoring of deployed models.
Communicate findings and insights to stakeholders through reports, dashboards, and presentations.
Required Qualifications:
Bachelors or Master’s degree in data science, Computer Science, Statistics, or a related field.
2-4 years of experience in data science or machine learning.
Proven experience deploying AI/ML models into production environments.
Proficiency in programming languages such as Python, R, or SQL.

Familiarity with Natural Language Processing (NLP) and large language models (LLMs).
Excellent problem-solving skills and a keen interest in staying updated with the latest advancements in AI/ML.
What We Offer:
Competitive salary and benefits package.

If you are passionate about data science and eager to make an impact by deploying AI solutions at scale, we encourage you to apply!

Job Title: Data Scientist and Machine Learning Engineer
Job Description:
About the Role

We are seeking a Data Scientist and Machine Learning Expert with hands-on experience to work on our data science and machine learning initiatives. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in developing machine learning models, building statistical models, data engineering, and conducting in-depth analysis of complex datasets. This role offers an exciting opportunity to work on cutting-edge initiatives and collaborate with a diverse team of professionals to deliver impactful platforms.


Responsibilities

Develop and implement machine learning models and algorithms to solve complex business problems.
Manage data collection, cleaning, and preprocessing, along with feature engineering to ensure the data quality and readiness for machine learning tasks.
Build and deploy statistical models to analyze and interpret large datasets, identifying trends, patterns, and insights.
Conduct exploratory data analysis to gain insights into data characteristics, anomalies, and potential biases. Train, fine-tune, and optimize complex machine learning models using large datasets.
Develop data pipelines and workflows for efficient data processing, cleansing, and transformation.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to gather requirements, define project objectives, and deliver solutions that meet business needs.
Work under guidance of lead data scientist and follow best practices in data science, statistical modeling, and data engineering.
Stay abreast of the latest advancements in machine learning techniques, statistical methods, and data engineering technologies.
Communicate findings and recommendations to stakeholders through clear and concise presentations and reports.

Requirements

The ideal candidate will be a quick learner, well-versed in the latest AI/ML and data trends and have a track record of delivering successful outcomes
Bachelor's or Master's in Computer Science, Mathematics/Statistics, or related field.
Proven hands-on experience in data science, machine learning, statistical modeling, and data engineering. Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to translate business requirements into technical solutions.
In-depth understanding of statistical concepts and techniques, with experience in hypothesis testing, regression analysis, time series analysis, etc. Proven track record of developing and implementing complex machine learning algorithms and models.
Skilled AI/ML Engineer with expertise in NLP, Machine Learning, and Data Analytics. Proficiency in programming languages such as Python, R, or Java, with experience in libraries such as TensorFlow, PyTorch, scikit-learn, etc.
Extensive experience with data preprocessing, Exploratory Data Analysis (EDA), feature engineering, and model evaluation. Comprehensive understanding of machine learning and deep learning algorithms. Specialization in Natural Language Processing, including areas such as Transformers, HuggingFace, etc.
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to effectively collaborate with cross-functional teams.
Proven track record of delivering high-quality solutions in a fast-paced environment.
Ability to work independently and lead projects from inception to completion.


Location: This position is based in Pune or Bangalore, India. Candidates must be willing to work from one of these locations.
Education: UG: B.Tech/B.E. in Computers
Key Skills: Java, Machine Learning, R, Python, Tensorflow, Exploratory Data Analysis, Natural Language Processing, Model Lifecycle Management, Modeling, Deep Learning, Scikit-Learn, Numpy, Data Science, Pytorch

Job Description:
RYour opportunity
New Relic is a leader in the Observability industry and has been on the forefront of
developing cutting edge AI/ML solutions. We are seeking an experienced and dynamic
Data Scientist to join our team. You will develop ML solutions for customer problems
from scratch utilizing large complex data sets of both structured and unstructured
formats. Your responsibilities will include developing, prototyping and productionizing
ML models. You will have broad expertise in ML techniques including Conventional ML
(both supervised and unsupervised), Deep Learning and GenAI/LLMs. With a start-up
growth story, these are exciting times for New Relic to make a significant impact on AI
Observability and even more exciting for Data Scientists to join us and contribute to that
journey.
What you will do
Conduct multiple experiments using different ML techniques for defined
objectives of regression/classification/clustering tasks.
Develop prototypes for end-to-end ML solutions from pre-processing to the
model evaluation stages.
Perform basic and advanced data analysis to uncover trends and correlations in
the data. Utilize statistical methods to drive insightful recommendations for
process improvements.
Be abreast of the advanced research and techniques in the ML and Deep-learning
space to adopt latest techniques for experimentation and prototype-building.
Design and analyze A/B tests with appropriate statistical methods
Communicate data-driven recommendations internally in the team and externally
This role requires
3+ years proven experience as a Data Scientist, or in a similar role.
Master's degree in Machine Learning, Statistics, Mathematics, Computer Science,
or related quantitative field.
Strong proficiency in scripting language, Python.
Proficiency in data querying languages (SQL) and data visualization tools
(Tableau/Looker/PowerBI).
Proficiency in Machine Learning techniques - both ML Breadth and Depth.
Proficiency in ML model development process including but not limited to
Feature Selection, Feature Engineering, Pre-processing and Post-processing,
Hyperparameter tuning.
Familiarity with common ML/NLP libraries such as PyTorch, Tensorflow,
HuggingFace Transformers, and SpaCy.
Familiarity with AWS/Azure/GCP tech stack (AWS Sagemaker, Redshift, S3, EC2,
Glue etc.)
Good technical communication skills, ability to work independently and priortize
parallel tasks well.
Ability to translate business needs into data science / analytics initiatives.
Bonus points if you have
Experience developing OR - Optimization models like inventory and network
optimization, have hands-on experience in Linear Programming.
Experience in the Observability domain is a bonus.
Experience in Reinforcement Learning models.
Experience of deploying and managing ML models in production environments is
a plus.
Education: PG: Any Postgraduate
Key Skills: Data Science, Python, Machine Learning, Statistics, SQL

Job Description:
Job Title: Senior Data Scientist

Company: Adzguru Exports LLP

Location: Kolkata; Papua New Guinea

Position Overview:
We are seeking an experienced Data Scientist with a minimum of 6 years of industry experience to lead data-driven projects and provide actionable insights to our stakeholders. The ideal candidate will possess a deep understanding of data analytics, statistical modeling, and machine learning techniques. The role requires a proactive individual who is not only skilled in data science but also willing to travel abroad to engage with stakeholders and drive our data initiatives on a global scale.

Key Responsibilities:

Data Analysis & Modeling: Design and implement advanced statistical models and machine learning algorithms to analyze complex datasets and derive actionable insights.
Stakeholder Engagement: Collaborate with internal and external stakeholders, including international partners, to understand their data needs and deliver tailored solutions.
Data Strategy: Develop and execute data strategies that align with business objectives, enhancing data quality, and optimizing data-driven decision-making processes.
Reporting & Visualization: Create comprehensive reports and interactive dashboards to communicate findings and recommendations effectively to both technical and non-technical audiences.
Project Management: Lead and manage data science projects from conception to deployment, ensuring timely delivery and alignment with business goals.
Travel: Travel abroad as needed to meet with stakeholders, understand their requirements, and support global data initiatives.

Qualifications:

Experience: Minimum of 6 years of experience in data science, with a proven track record of delivering impactful data-driven solutions.
Education: Bachelors or Masters degree in Data Science, Computer Science, Statistics, Mathematics, or a related field.
Technical Skills: Proficiency in programming languages such as Python, R, or SQL. Experience with data visualization tools (e.g., Tableau, Power BI) and big data technologies (e.g., Hadoop, Spark) is highly desirable.
Analytical Skills: Strong analytical and problem-solving skills with a deep understanding of statistical methods and machine learning techniques.
Communication: Excellent verbal and written English communication skills, with the ability to present complex data insights in a clear and actionable manner.
Adaptability: Willingness to travel internationally and work in diverse cultural environments.


Benefits:
Competitive salary and performance-based bonuses.
Comprehensive health and wellness benefits.
Opportunities for international travel and professional growth.
Dynamic and collaborative work environment.

Application Process:
Interested candidates can also submit their resume and a cover letter detailing their relevant experience and interest in the role. Please send your application to accounts@adzguru.in

Adzguru Exports LLP is an equal opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees.

We look forward to finding a talented Data Scientist who is ready to make an impact and drive success for Adzguru Exports LLP on a global scale!

Present findings and insights to technical and non-technical audiences, including executive leadership.

Experience (Relevant 5+ years):
Proven experience in data science roles with a focus on machine learning, AI, and predictive modeling.
Experience working with real-time/streaming data and telematics is highly desirable.
Background in the automotive industry or with automotive data is a plus.

Excellent problem-solving abilities, with a knack for deriving actionable insights from complex datasets.

Job Description:
Job Description:
We are seeking Senior Data Scientists (4 to 5 Candidates) to join our Data Science Team and work with India s largest FMCG Organisation at our Clients Supply Chain and Distribution division in Kolkata. This role is ideal for a seasoned professional with a deep understanding of supply chain and distribution dynamics and the ability to independently drive data-driven decisions that enhance operational efficiency.

Key Responsibilities:
1. Analyze and optimize Distribution and Supply Chain processes using advanced statistical and machine learning techniques to reduce costs, improve efficiency, and enhance overall supply chain performance.
2. Develop predictive models for demand forecasting, inventory management, and logistics optimization to ensure timely and cost-effective distribution of products.
3. Leverage Python and SQL to manage, clean, and analyze large datasets related to supply chain and distribution, identifying trends, bottlenecks, and opportunities for improvement.
4. Design and implement data-driven solutions for inventory optimization, warehouse management, and transportation logistics, ensuring smooth operations and minimal disruptions.
5. Create interactive dashboards and visualizations using Tableau or Power BI to effectively communicate Distribution and Supply Chain Insights to Client's management and stakeholders.
6. Collaborate with logistics, procurement, and operations teams to align data science initiatives with business goals and drive improvements in supply chain efficiency.
7. Apply statistical analysis and hypothesis testing to validate models and refine supply chain strategies, ensuring data-driven decision-making.
8. Stay current with advancements in data science, machine learning, and AI, applying relevant technologies to enhance Client's supply chain and distribution processes.

Skills and Qualifications:
1.Education: Masters in computer science, Statistics, Mathematics, Data Science, or a related field.
2. Experience: 6-8 years of experience in data science, with a strong focus on supply chain and distribution within the FMCG sector.
3. Technical Proficiency: Advanced skills in Python (including libraries like NumPy, pandas, scikit-learn) and SQL, with proven experience in implementing data science solutions for supply chain management.
4. Analytical Skills: Expertise in developing predictive models, performing statistical analysis, and optimizing supply chain operations.
5. Independence: Ability to work independently, manage complex projects, and deliver impactful results with minimal oversight.
6. Communication: Strong communication skills, capable of translating complex data insights into actionable strategies for non-technical stakeholders.
7. Leadership: Experience in mentoring and leading data science projects that drive significant business impact.
8. Tool Knowledge: Proficient in data visualization tools such as Tableau or Power BI. Familiarity with big data technologies (e.g., Spark, Hadoop) and cloud platforms (e.g., AWS, Azure, GCP) is a plus.

These roles do not require AI / machine learning expertise but instead demand deep subject matter expertise in coding, coupled with fluent English and critical thinking. This role requires you to teach AI models how to code instead of writing code yourself and help many programmers in the future to code better.

These are project-based part-time roles that offer flexible hours, with an anticipated commitment of 2-3 hours daily. They are remote roles where you need to work off a PC of your own. You will be training AI models on:
- Text to SQL Conversion
- SQL query Debugging

Pay will vary by project and typically starts at ~Rs. 800 per hour (if you work an average of 3 hours every day - that could be as high as Rs 70k per month).

Job Description:
Description
Ciklum is looking for a Data Scientist to join our team full-time in India.

We are a custom product engineering company that supports both multinational organizations and scaling startups to solve their most complex business challenges. With a global team of over 4, 000 highly skilled developers, consultants, analysts and product owners, we engineer technology that redefines industries and shapes the way people live.

About the role:

As a Data Scientist, become a part of a cross-functional development team engineering experiences of tomorrow.


Responsibilities

Development of prototype solutions, mathematical models, algorithms, machine learning techniques, and robust analytics to support analytic insights and visualization of complex data sets

Create pipelines for cleaning, processing, and transformation of raw data from both database and CSV/Excel/Text sources

Work on exploratory data analysis so you can navigate a dataset and come out with broad conclusions based on initial appraisals

Create visualizations to interpret trained models, prove models being fit client s needs as well as provide storytelling, explain relationships, and show insights

Understanding of Machine Learning model quality metrics with typical cases of their applicability

Improve Machine Learning model productivity as well as performance optimization

Interacts with engineering teams and ensures that solutions meet customer requirements in terms of functionality, performance, availability, scalability, and reliability

Work directly with business analysts and data engineers to understand and support their use cases

Work with stakeholders throughout the organization to identify opportunities for leveraging company data to drive business solutions

Drive innovation by exploring new experimentation methods and statistical techniques that could sharpen or speed up our product decision-making processes

Contribute to the unit s activities like research opportunities, PoC creation, and Data Science tools discovery



Requirements
We know that sometimes, you can t tick every box. We would still love to hear from you if you think you re a good fit!

Ability to do NEW development work. Not only executing planned tasks but coming up with How to is crucial for this position.


Experience: At least 3 years in developing Machine Learning solutions with a demonstrable track record of leveraging analytics to significantly impact business outcomes

Education: Bachelor s or Master s degree in Mathematics, Statistics, Computer Science, Operations Research, Econometrics, or a related field

MLOps Expertise: Minimum 1 year of experience with MLOps practices, including the integration of reliable Machine Learning pipelines in production, proficiency in Docker, containerization, and orchestration techniques

Cloud Proficiency: Strong experience with cloud services and infrastructure. Familiarity with cloud AI and ML services is essential. Cloud certification is highly regarded

Technical Skills:

Knowledge in probability theory, statistics, and the mathematics behind machine learning

Proficient in Python for ML solution development and statistical analysis, with experience in libraries such as Pandas, Scikit-learn, TensorFlow or PyTorch

Solid understanding of SQL for data manipulation and reporting

Experience with data visualization tools (e. g. Tableau, PowerBI) and libraries (e. g. Matplotlib, seaborn)

Understanding of CRISP-ML(Q) / TDSP concept



Project Management: Exceptional time and project management skills, with the ability to manage detailed work and communicate project status effectively across all levels

Innovative Mindset: Self-motivated with a drive to learn and master new technologies and techniques. Comfortable working with loosely defined requirements and leveraging creativity and analytical skills to deliver best-in-class solutions



Desirable

Kubernetes Experience: Direct experience with Kubernetes is strongly preferred, reflecting our operational reliance on container orchestration for deploying scalable ML solutions

Transition to Apache Zeppelin: Interest or experience in Apache Zeppelin, as part of our strategic move to enhance our analytics and machine learning development environment

Microservice Architecture: Understanding of or experience with microservice architecture, especially with a focus on transitioning away from Kubeflow dependencies

Advanced-Data & AI Skills:

Experience in Deep Learning is a plus

Experience with GenAI deployment and fine-tuning, utilizing LLMs to provide software automation capability integrations, experience with LangChain

Experience with Databricks, Snowflake platforms, PySpark is a plus

Experience with Rapids (GPU-accelerated data science libraries) is a significant advantage





What's in it for you

Care: your mental and physical health is our priority. We ensure comprehensive company-paid medical insurance, as well as financial and legal consultation

Tailored education path: boost your skills and knowledge with our regular internal events (meetups, conferences, workshops), Udemy licence, language courses and company-paid certifications

Growth environment: share your experience and level up your expertise with a community of skilled professionals, locally and globally

Flexibility: hybrid work mode at Chennai or Pune

Opportunities: we value our specialists and always find the best options for them. Our Resourcing Team helps change a project if needed to help you grow, excel professionally and fulfil your potential

Global impact: work on large-scale projects that redefine industries with international and fast-growing clients

Welcoming environment: feel empowered with a friendly team, open-door policy, informal atmosphere within the company and regular team-building events
Education:
UG: Any Graduate
PG: Any Postgraduate
Key Skills: Computer science, Data analysis, Operations research, Automation, Resourcing, Medical insurance, Business solutions, Econometrics, Operations, SQL

Responsibilities:

Data mining or extracting usable data from valuable data sources
Utilize predictive modeling to increase and optimize customer experiences, revenue generation, ad targeting, and other business outcomes.
Develop company A/B testing frameworks and test model quality.
Coordinate with cross functional teams to implement models and monitor outcomes.
Conduct data-driven research and create models to understand complex behaviors and trends.
Present data insights and recommendations to senior management for strategic decision-making.
Develop and maintain prediction systems and machine learning algorithms.

Qualifications:

Minimum 4+ years of experience in the IT industry.
Strong problem-solving skills with an emphasis on product development.
Knowledge of a variety of machine learning techniques (clustering, decision tree learning, artificial neural networks, etc.) and their real-world advantages/drawbacks.
Experience using statistical computer languages (R, Python, SQL, etc.) to manipulate data and draw insights from large data sets.
A drive to learn and master new technologies and techniques.
Experience working with and creating data architectures.
Education: UG: Any Graduate
Key Skills: Machine Learning Algorithms, Machine Learning, Pricing Strategy, SQL, Data Science, Predictive Modeling, R, Pricing Analysis, Python

Job Description:
